title: 3v5 Forced forfeit option
body:
Riot can you please implement a FORCED FORFEIT for games that have 2 afk's on your side. Even a 4v5, it should be calculated by how much the enemy team is winning, their towers, amount of gold gained, and kills.

Don't even bother posting if you're a "i never surrender" "you can win 4v5's" I don't really care for people like you. Thanks.

replies.body:
There should never be a FORCED forfeit.

However i will say i think the 20 minute timer should be removed for when the game has an AFK (especially from the start of the game.)
Maybe not removed but definitely brought down to 10 minutes, if someone hasn't been active for 10 min it's probably GG.
Honestly, i would rather it wasn't even 10 minutes, because by then i feel i've put enough effort into the game to not be bothered surrendering.
Iv won plenty of 4v5's. Try harder and use your advantages. Ie. if there are only 4 of you. You will most likely get more exp and more cs.

Didn't OP say not to post stuff like this?

Yeah I've won 4v5's, even a 3v5 that took a whole hour, but nobody likes being forced to play an extra 15 minutes when they **know** that all hope is lost. The idea is to have the option to forfeit if people get stuck like that.
The issue I see with this is people harassing noobs to leave the game so they can surrender a 4v5, that would really suck.

The first counter argument will be "how do you **know** if someone is AFK?" It's a fair point, but if someone has actually disconnected, there should definitely be something like this. Maybe have some conditions like, with 4v5 if the enemy has taken 3 towers before 10 minutes start an automatic vote. I hate having to suffer an extra 10 minutes of a game when everyone is sick of it and the enemy team can't/won't end it.
